column4: Hello. I have xubuntu newly installed in a 1024x768 capable laptop but it is only giving me 800x600
ok try this,  edit xorg.conf and add the extra resolutions you need in the list,  then restart X
I have 1024x678 & 800x600, but the 1024x768 isn't showing as an option
can you pastebin your xorg.conf file so I can have a look ?
hold on , let me have a look
so , just add  1024x768 to the list

sorry I got confused I thogut you mentions 1280x1024 earlier,   and it doesn't show up in your  screen resolution applet ? weird,  try this,    in the terminal   sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg ,   reselect your video card, answer all questions as best you can and when in any doudt , use the default provided ,
thanks, I tried but didn't work. I had tried in the past, but I gave it another try. Still 800x600.
maybe try asking in #xubuntu , they might know better, or also check in the forum www.ubuntuforums.org
